question: As per OECD’s interim economic outlook report, what would be the GDP growth rate of India in FY22?
explanation:
Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) released the interim economic outlook. It has pegged India’s gross domestic product (GDP) growth to rebound to 12.6% in FY22.
As per the organisation, the growth of India will be the fastest in the world, followed by China at 7.8% growth. OECD also estimated that India’s GDP is expected to grow at 5.4% in the following financial year.
